snippet: The goal of Project Re:Brief is to change minds on Madison Avenue about new technologies in general, and Google products and services in particular. In its latest effort, Google imagines the rest of the day after Ralph "ate the whole thing."
abstract: The goal of Project Re:Brief is to change minds on Madison Avenue about new technologies in general, and Google products and services in particular. In its latest effort, Google imagines the rest of the day after Ralph "ate the whole thing."

headline.main: Google Ad Project Updates Classic Alka-Seltzer and Avis Pitches
